Name: basicConstraints
ValidationRules: Present for all BR-compliant EE certs

Name: cRLDistributionPoints
ValidationRules: CRLs published and updated per CPS

Name: id-ecPublicKey
ValidationRules: Curve must be allowed by BRs

Name: extendedKeyUsage
ValidationRules: id-kp-serverAuth MUST be present for TLS server certs

Name: certificatePolicies
ValidationRules: MUST include at least one policy OID per TLS BR

Name: authorityKeyIdentifier
ValidationRules: MUST be included per RFC 5280 for non-self-signed certs
